3DSM.TITLE: 3D Material Eyedropper tool
3DSM.DESCRIPTION: Loads the selected material from a 3D object

3DDM.TITLE: 3D Material Drop tool
3DDM.DESCRIPTION: Drops material loaded in the tool onto the target area of a 3D object

AKNT.TITLE: Add Anchor Point tool
AKNT.DESCRIPTION: Adds anchor points to your paths

ARTT.TITLE: Artboard tool
ARTT.DESCRIPTION: Creates, moves, or resizes multiple canvases

AHBT.TITLE: Art History Brush tool
AHBT.DESCRIPTION: Paints stylized strokes with pixels from an earlier state of the image

SERA.TITLE: Background Eraser tool
SERA.DESCRIPTION: Erases the pixels of a sampled color

STAM.TITLE: Clone Stamp tool
STAM.DESCRIPTION: Paints with pixels from another part of the image

CRBT.TITLE: Color Replacement tool
CRBT.DESCRIPTION: Paints the selected color over an existing color

COLS.TITLE: Color Sampler tool
COLS.DESCRIPTION: Displays values for colors in an image

RCMP.TITLE: Content Aware Move tool
RCMP.DESCRIPTION: Selects and moves part of an image and automatically fills the area left behind

COUN.TITLE: Count tool
COUN.DESCRIPTION: Counts the number of objects in an image

CKNT.TITLE: Convert Point tool
CKNT.DESCRIPTION: Edits shapes and paths by converting smooth and corner anchor points

CROP.TITLE: Crop tool
CROP.DESCRIPTION: Trims or expands the edges of an image

CUSH.TITLE: Custom Shape tool
CUSH.DESCRIPTION: Draws shapes from a custom shape list

DKNT.TITLE: Delete Anchor Point tool
DKNT.DESCRIPTION: Deletes anchor points and reshapes paths

PTHA.TITLE: Direct Selection tool
PTHA.DESCRIPTION: Selects the individual points and segments of a path

ELMT.TITLE: Elliptical Marquee tool
ELMT.DESCRIPTION: Makes a selection in the shape of an ellipse

ERAS.TITLE: Eraser tool
ERAS.DESCRIPTION: Changes pixels to the background color or makes them transparent

MPEN.TITLE: Freeform Pen tool
MPEN.DESCRIPTION: Adds anchor points as you draw paths or shapes

BNDT.TITLE: Gradient tool
BNDT.DESCRIPTION: Creates a gradual blend between colors

HAND.TITLE: Hand tool
HAND.DESCRIPTION: Pans over different parts of an image

STMM.TITLE: Healing Brush tool
STMM.DESCRIPTION: Repairs imperfections using pixels from another part of the image

HSTB.TITLE: History Brush tool
HSTB.DESCRIPTION: Restores parts of an image to an earlier state

TYPS.TITLE: Horizontal Type Mask tool
TYPS.DESCRIPTION: Creates a selection in the shape of horizontal type

MERA.TITLE: Magic Eraser tool
MERA.DESCRIPTION: Erases similarly colored areas with a single click

MLAS.TITLE: Magnetic Lasso tool
MLAS.DESCRIPTION: Makes a selection by snapping to image edges

WETB.TITLE: Mixer Brush tool
WETB.DESCRIPTION: Simulates real painting techniques, such as blending colors and varying paint wetness

TXTA.TITLE: Note tool
TXTA.DESCRIPTION: Creates text notes that you can attach to an image or file

BUCK.TITLE: Paint Bucket tool
BUCK.DESCRIPTION: Fills similarly colored contiguous areas with the foreground color

PTCH.TITLE: Patch tool
PTCH.DESCRIPTION: Replaces a selected area using a pattern or pixels from another part of the image

PENT.TITLE: Pen tool
PENT.DESCRIPTION: Makes and changes paths or shapes with anchor points and handles

PCRP.TITLE: Perspective Crop tool
PCRP.DESCRIPTION: Crops an image to correct distortions caused by perspective

QKSL.TITLE: Quick Selection tool
QKSL.DESCRIPTION: Makes a selection by finding and following the edges in an image

RGMT.TITLE: Rectangular Marquee tool
RGMT.DESCRIPTION: Makes a selection in the shape of a rectangle

RDEY.TITLE: Red Eye tool
RDEY.DESCRIPTION: Fixes the red-eye effect caused by a camera flash

ROTT.TITLE: Rotate View tool
ROTT.DESCRIPTION: Rotates the view of an image

MEAT.TITLE: Ruler tool
MEAT.DESCRIPTION: Measures distances and angles in an image

SHAR.TITLE: Sharpen tool
SHAR.DESCRIPTION: Sharpens the soft edges in an image

SRMT.TITLE: Single Row Marquee tool
SRMT.DESCRIPTION: Makes a horizontal selection that’s a single pixel high

SCMT.TITLE: Single Column Marquee tool
SCMT.DESCRIPTION: Makes a vertical selection that’s a single pixel wide

SLCT.TITLE: Slice tool
SLCT.DESCRIPTION: Cuts an image into smaller sections suitable for web design

SLST.TITLE: Slice Select tool
SLST.DESCRIPTION: Selects, moves, and resizes slices of an image

SMUD.TITLE: Smudge tool
SMUD.DESCRIPTION: Softens or smudges colors in an image

SATU.TITLE: Sponge tool
SATU.DESCRIPTION: Changes the color saturation of areas in an image

VTYS.TITLE: Verticle Type Mask tool
VTYS.DESCRIPTION: Creates a selection in the shape of vertical type

ZOOM.TITLE: Zoom tool
ZOOM.DESCRIPTION: Magnifies or reduces the view of an image

CPEN.TITLE: Curvature Pen Tool
CPEN.DESCRIPTION: Makes or changes paths or shapes using points

PMHA.TITLE: Hand Tool
PMHA.DESCRIPTION: Pans over different parts of an image

PMZM.TITLE: Zoom Tool
PMZM.DESCRIPTION: Magnifies or reduces the view of an image
